from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
import requests

# Define the API endpoint and parameters
api_key = "ySU0TYXTGTHAOSSWF"
ticker = "AAPL"
api_endpoint = f"https://www.alphavantage.co/query?function=TIME_SERIES_DAILY_ADJUSTED&symbol={ticker}&apikey={api_key}"

# Make the API request and retrieve the JSON response
response = requests.get(api_endpoint)
response_json = response.json()

# Create a Spark session
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("AlphaVantageData").getOrCreate()

# Convert the JSON response to a Spark DataFrame
data = list(response_json["Time Series (Daily)"].items())
df = spark.createDataFrame(data, ["date", "values"])

# Print the DataFrame
df.show()
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save('abfss://bronze@ovenmittsynapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/alphavantage')
